input_email_body:
Subject: Security Incident in Hospital System

A security breach has been detected in the hospital's system, potentially compromising medical data My name is John Doe.. This may have occurred due to outdated software and weak access controls You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.. While firewall rules have been implemented and security protocols updated, vulnerabilities still exist.
